prod_short_desc: Chase down the crook with the ATV!
prod_long_desc:
Be part of the action with the LEGO® City police as they keep the city safe, featuring a police ATV and pair of handcuffs, plus a two-wheeled hand truck and safe with opening door, gold bars and a crowbar. Includes two minifigures.
Includes two minifigures: a police officer and a crook.
Features a police ATV, two-wheeled hand truck and a safe with an opening door.
Catch the crook on the ATV and put the cuffs on him!
Accessory elements include a pair of handcuffs, crowbar and two gold bars.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
ATV measures over 1” high, 1” long and 1” wide.
